tree.compliment: Hi {{name}}, welcome to Blue Bank, How can I help you?

start.name: history
start.tags: account activity, check my account history, show me the account extract
start.answer: Your card activity in the last 7 days: {{checkHistory}}

start.name: credit_card
start.tags: credit card, help with my card, talk about my credit card
start.answer: How can we help you with your credit card?

childs.name: new_card
childs.tags: ask for a new card, I would like to request a new card, I need another card
childs.answerFloat: Your new credit card was approved, and the card limit is USD: {{checkCredit}}
childs.answerNull: Sorry, at this time we cannot issue you a card.

childs.name: more_credit
childs.tags: I need more limit, I would like a bigger credit limit, can you give me more limit
childs.answerFloat: Your request was approved, new limit is USD: {{checkCredit}}
childs.answerNull: Sorry, at this time we cannot give you more credit.

childs.name: cancel_credit_card
childs.tags: I would like to cancel the card, I don't need the card anymore
childs.answer: We are sorry you want to cancel your credit card, we can offer you a limit of USD: {{creditCardOffer.limit}}, with the tax of {{creditCardOffer.tax}} per month. Do you want to try our new offer or do you really want to cancel the card?

options.name: new_offer
options.answer: Thank you for staying with us, your credit card was just ajusted to the limit of USD: {{creditCardOffer.limit}}, with the tax of {{creditCardOffer.tax}} per month.

options.name: confirm_cancel
options.answer: Your credit card was just cancelled. Do you want to inform us any problem that made you cancel your card?

start.name: financing
start.tags: I need to finance a house, I want to simulate a new card
start.answer: For a better financing analysis, we will redirect you to a human attendant.
